Key:
Yes?
...Come in.

Oh, Yoshino...
You're back again. What's wrong?

Oh, Yoshino...
What's wrong? Did something happen?
W-Well... Today, um... Yoshinon wants to...
Huh? Yoshinon wants to talk...? To me...?
Hey, what's with that tone?! Is it not okay for\nYoshinon to want to talk to you, Shido-kun?

N-No, of course not... I just thought
it was a rare event.
Yoshinon... What do you... want to talk about?
That's... a secret～!
A... secret?
That's right! Yoshinon and Yoshino, we're each\ngoing to have a secret conversation with you!
A secret conversation... Why so suddenly?
You're gonna make me say it, Shido-kun?\nAww gee, even though you know already?
...Just between you and me, a secret between two\npeople has the effect of deepening their\nrelationship!
D-Deepening our... relationship?!
(What the hell is Yoshinon saying?!)
Aww, good grief, Shido-kun. You just imagined\nsomething pervy, didn't you? That's not it,\nI meant in a platonic way!
You want to get closer to Shido-kun,\nright Yoshino?

Yeah... I-I want to... become closer friends...
with Shido-san.
If you share secrets during a secret\nconversation, it has the effect of\nstrengthening your bond.
Let's... have a secret conversation...
Er, well... I don't mind, but...
All right, it's decided! Now then, let's begin\nthe Nighttime Secret Conversation Tournament!
Well then, let's start first with Yoshino.\nI'll cover my ears!
(Covering his ears? My, how skillful...)
U-Um... my, secret is...

Oh, well... you don't have to push
yourself to say it, okay?
N-No... I-I can tell you...!
O-Okay. Then, I'll listen.

My... secret is... um... I'm shy, and...
I'm scared of... people I don't know...
A-Ahh... right...

(Of course, that's something one could tell just
by looking. I don't really feel that’s on the
level of a secret...)

And then... in the city... you know?
Um... there are people... who talk to you...

Oh, you mean the people who give out street
surveys and tissue packs? It does seem like you
wouldn't do well with them, Yoshino.

Th-That's it...! Um... I'm scared, of being talked
to... so when I see tissues, I end up
running away...

Just from looking at tissues?
Hmmm... Is that some sort of
post-traumatic stress?

I-I don't know. But... I need to overcome this...
Somehow...
I see. Good for you. Do your best, Yoshino.
...Yeah!

Your secret is over now, Yoshino.
Heeey, Yoshinon. It's your turn next!
It's over? Is it over?! How was it?!\nYoshino's secret... Was it juicy?
Who knows... It's a secret.
Ooohh, you're such a meanie, Shido-kun!! But,\nit's fine. Yoshinon will respect Yoshino's\nsecret!!
Thank you, Yoshinon...

So, now I have to listen to your secret,
right Yoshinon?
Yes, that's right～! Now then, you have to cover\nyour ears this time, Yoshino!

My ears... Oh... because Yoshinon's here...
I can't cover... with both of my hands...

Oh, of course. Then... I think if you put these
headphones on, it should be all right.

Listen to some music for a while.
...All right, Yoshinon. Go ahead and tell me.

...Hmm?
What's wrong, Yoshinon?
What on earth are you...?
Okay! Is it okay?!
Whoa, you surprised me!
Shido-kun, you're listening, right? I'm gonna\ntalk, okay? I'm gonna tell you my secret now,\nokay?

(That's right, Yoshino's covering her ears, so
Yoshinon can't hear me, either. For now,
I guess I'll respond to her with a gesture.)
Okay! Then, Yoshinon's Full-Disclosure Talk Show\nwill now begin!!
The secret that Yoshinon will tell you...\nis about Yoshino～
So it really was about Yoshino...
Shido-kun, Yoshino really trusts you a lot.
It might be pretty obvious, but I know that when\nyou're around, Yoshino keeps growing in a good\ndirection～
It really makes your heart grow quickly when\nthere's someone that's important to you～
But, on that topic, Yoshinon sometimes thinks...\nWhat kind of effect does Yoshinon have\non Yoshino?
Yoshinon...
Yoshinon always did things while thinking of\nYoshino. But... Yoshinon wonders if what Yoshinon\ndid for Yoshino was really for her sake...
...Yoshinon?
...Shido-kun.
Y-Yeah?
...When the time comes, take\ncare of Yoshino, okay?
Huh...?
...If, possibly... when the time comes that\nYoshinon can't be by Yoshino's side... I'm sure\nthat Yoshino is going to be lonely and cry.
So... during that time... if that ever happens...\nI want you to comfort Yoshino, Shido-kun!
Hey, what does that...?
...Okay, secret talk is over!!\nIt's okay for you to listen again, Yoshino～!!
Wh-What did you, talk about...?
Whaaat, you're gonna ask?\nAll this hush-hush will be\nfor nothing if I tell you!

Oh, th-that's right...
I-I'm sorry...
Shido-san? Is... something wrong...?
Oh, er... It's nothing, really...

(Yoshinon seemed to be acting somewhat different
than she usually does... Was it just me...?)
Hey, sorry to keep you all waiting! Now, for\ntoday's main event! It's time for Shido-kun\nto reveal his secret!!
Huh?
Yoshinon wants to hear your secret, Shido-kun!
M-Me too... I'd like... to hear...
Give us a real good one! If it's boring,\nwe'll have to start all over!
Er, ah... Th-That's a little... I'd rather not...
No, no! After hearing Yoshino's and Yoshinon's\nsecrets, it's not fair for you to run away.\nRight, Yoshino?
That's not... fair...
D-Do I really have to...?
Of course! Yeah!!\nSe—cret!! Se—cret!!

(Once again, another part of my dark history
is going to be revealed, huh...?)
